snippet.title: Towerborne - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
The Belfry stands as a beacon of hope and safety amongst the ruins of humanity, where monsters lurk outside the tower’s walls. You are an Ace, born anew from the spirit realm with special skills, grit, and determination. Unite with other Aces in a thrilling venture into a new world to protect 
the people of the Belfry.

Can you become the Ace humanity needs to survive? Join us in Towerborne, a fast-paced, hope-filled, action RPG.  In this vibrant world with exhilarating combat, you’ll take on malevolent forces solo or alongside your companions and fight as one.

Adventure Together – Venture out of the Belfry solo or with up to three other Aces to vanquish the looming terror that surrounds the tower. Either way, you won’t be alone. Aces can recruit Umbra companions to join them in battle, gaining access to enhanced skills and unique abilities tied to each spirit. After fighting your way through enemies, return to the Belfry to turn in quests, reforge gear, and more.

Brave the Wilds – Towerborne is all about player choice. Create your Ace and customize your looks, gear and weapons.** Switch up your gameplay experience at any time by changing the danger level as you venture into the wilds. Find and wield powerful weapons with unique special moves. Mix and match to make your Ace your own!

Continue the Fight – With an evolving world map and ongoing content updates, your Ace will never run out of areas to explore and enemies to defeat. Keep the adventure going with new enemies to battle, regions to discover, abilities to master, and lore to uncover (available as released).

** This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual 
currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items

*▶ Find us on Social Media:*

Join our social media channels for more exclusive Towerborne content!

👾Discord - https://go.towerborne.com/discord
✨TikTok - https://go.towerborne.com/tiktok 
🔮 Twitch - https://go.towerborne.com/twitch
📷Instagram - https://go.towerborne.com/Instagram 
🐦X - https://go.towerborne.com/Twitter   
❎ Xbox - https://go.towerborne.com/Xbox
🎮 STEAM - https://go.towerborne.com/STEAM 
🏰Towerborne - https://www.towerborne.com
